document_data.name: Chizelo
document_data.mainbody: '''Chizelo''' was a young man living in [[Easthaven]] during the 11{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The red haired man liked to wear grey and green tunics.
document_data.Personality: Chizelo was an nervous young boy who had a hard time holding his bladder.
document_data.Activities: Like many kids in the small community, Chizelo was interested in all the strangers coming into the [[Ten Towns]].
document_data.Relationships: Chizelo was friends with a few other local children, like [[Ahmadora]], [[Dillsandra]], and [[Jeffy]].
document_data.History: In [[Eleint]], [[1281 DR]], Chizelo and a few other children met a group of mercenaries who decided to head with [[Hrothgar]] on his expedition to [[Kuldahar]].
